term.title: biotransformation

item.text: Any chemical conversion of substances that is mediated by living organisms or enzyme preparations derived therefrom.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 148 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
